results.content: Mr. Macdonald has served in CEO and COO roles for over 25 years, most recently as the CEO at First Light Diagnostics, and formerly as a Division President, COO and Vice President at Quest Diagnostics. Mr. Macdonald is a result-oriented, decisive leader with biotech industry expertise in wide variety of medical diagnostic systems, molecular diagnostics, personalized medicine, pharma collaboration, medical devices, research products, and laboratory services. Mr. Macdonald has been an invited speaker at a variety of industry events and has served on several industry Advisory Boards and Boards of Directors. •    Medical Catalyst, LLC, CEO and Lead Catalyst. •    AMLo Biosciences Ltd., Non-Exec Member of the Board of Directors. •    Veramarx, Member of the Board of Directors. •    CEO and Board Member, First Light Diagnostics. •    CEO and Board Member, Agendia. •    CEO and Board Member, AltheaDx. •    CEO and Board Member, Nanomix. •    CEO and Board Member, Progeny Systems. •    Siemens Healthcare Diagnostics Strategic Advisory Board Member. •    California Med Tech Advisory Board Member. •    AdvaMed Emerging Growth Company Council Board of Directors.
